item.description:
As it had been a long while since this group met up, I would LOVE to be able to just get together and talk over some delicious pizza/drinks and get to know everybody. I also thought an "unloved" elephant yankee gift swap would be a fun idea for the group as of course, everybody LOVES presents!!!! (who doesn't, right????)...... So here are the details:
A. We will play the traditional yankee swap gift exchange game the same way, HOWEVER, this time around it will be the present you received this past holiday that was "NOT" your favorite pick.
B. The gift range MUST be 10.00-15.00 minimum (okay to go a little more if necessary).
C. Also, the gift must be something a guy/girl can appreciate.
D. Please have the gift either wrapped or in a gift bag as of course we don't want it to be visible during the game.
E. If you don't feel you have an "unloved" gift from the holidays, I am sure there is that "unloved" present somewhere you got for your birthday or another occasion.
I personally have done this type of gathering in the past with my own set of friends and you would really be in for a treat as there WILL be a lot more trading going on at this swap as everybody would traditionally go for that Borders gift card!!!!!, right????.......
I had made arrangements with the restaurant to have the gifts placed in an area for when it is time for us to play the game.
I also would like to hear your suggestions for future meet up events, so please feel free to e mail me personally if you are unable to attend my first event.
If people did want to continue hanging out afterwards, there is always the movies very close by, however of course I will leave that optional.
There is plenty of parking around and the location is very T accessable if you are coming by public transpertaion.
Also the limit is 20 attendees. If the list is full, please write a note in the "no" section saying you would like to attend if there is an opening and I will see what I can do.
Lastly I would appreciate it if you are going to sign up as a "yes" to please be 90 percent sure you are going to attend. (as I did have RSVP'ing problems in my Scrabble group) (Please read my note on the message board explaining)....
I am looking foward to a fun evening and meeting everybody!!! My e mail is always open if any more questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet at the hostess area as I will have balloons/red meet up shirt on

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Bertucci's Dinner/After Holiday Elephant "Unloved" Yankee Swap
